e or another had
no idea that museums could be that helpful:-)

So=
rry Mark, like Paul I'm in the UK and I've never seen the SCA in
action, al=
though I have bumped in to one or two of the local membership
over the year=
s. I run a tiny Japanese re-enactment group under the title
of "Shogun", us=
ing my own fighting system which I've been teaching for
some twenty years o=
r so now. Plus I run other events, so time is not
what I've got, so unless =

rful list.
